Are there any resources available to check the safety of the Verus software?

Yes, you can check the safety of the Verus software by visiting the VirusTotal website, which provides detection results from various antivirus engines. The links to VirusTotal for different platforms are:
- MacOS: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/a70cd7e14f4b43a0c0123fb938881ccc7900396ce14057e4887986c591a2d506/detection
- Linux-x86-64: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/26af0cebea1b579b1e7d55c3fcd927a2da1d58c4b3d4461e7039858f3f12f0f5/detection
- Linux-ARM64: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/ef820935c721c11b0843e7925be5ba56b77937030028ca4ccab038c3117571a1/detection
- Windows: https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/9c9d63e43e93b6c2b86a1ef2c70d62c92c9b280fa86a1c7c091b4053f48300a5/detection
